description: Jacinta Conceicao, the main caregiver for her husband, finds the emotional burden the hardest to bear. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: He doesn’t remember her name: The toll on the caregiver when dementia steals memories
title_page: He doesn’t remember her name: The toll on the caregiver when dementia steals memories | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Dementia crept up on Mr Rodney Paglar, devastating him and his wife, Ms Jacinta Conceicao, by stealth over the past decade.
Mr Paglar was just 59 when he was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease, the most common type of dementia.
